title: Alert!
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Industrial accidents
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
description: A series of incidents demonstrating the need for accident prevention. People on dangerous jobs are aware of the risks and keep their minds on their work, but passers-by and workers who are worried or inclined to day-dream, need to remember that nearly all accidents happen through thinking of something else. A quarter of all accidents happen through the job being done the wrong way; untidily, without safety devices or too fast. Film closes by re-emphasising the need to be constantly alert.
